summary: Removed the gloss effect texture on enchanted weapons entirely.
descriptionHtml:
Just a person preference. I know my sword will set bandits on fire, I don\'t need it to glow to remind me of that. ;)


-NOTE-
This just removes the texture from the enchantment effect. The color shader will persists if its used on that particular weapon. This is the best I can do without the CK. Once it\'s out. removing the all of the vanilla shader effects will be top mod priority.

For A really well done replacer (In contrast to this remover.) check out Enchantment Effect Replacer, by Myopic!

Link:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1345&navtag=file/images.php?id=1345&tab=3
author: Kyim
